name: workspace
description: **EFIR** is a pioneering complaint management platform built on the MERN stack, enhanced with cutting-edge generative AI (GenAI). This project revolutionizes the legal process by significantly reducing system lag and streamlining complaint handling with advanced technologies. Designed with security at its core, EFIR offers a dual-portal system for both regular users and super users like judiciary and police, ensuring precise tracking and efficient processing of legal complaints.
